0011101111111110 0010000011010101 0 -> sum: 0101110011010011, cout: 0
0101011011110010 1000101010000000 1 -> sum: 1110000101110011, cout: 0

1000011001101000 0111001001000111 0 -> sum: 1111100010101111, cout: 0
0000000101000100 0110011010011110 1 -> sum: 0110011111100011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
